description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Avatar Alarm Clock transforms your Xbox into a fully featured alarm clock. Avatar Alarm Clock replicates the features of high end alarm clocks. Feature such as waking you up gradually by simulating a natural daybreak with light and sound. Also soothing you to sleep with a choice of ambient sounds and calming graphics.  Feel comforted as you watch your Avatar sleep alongside you.
